name: Professor Natsumi
description:
Hanako's father. Natsumi translates losely to `vegetables, greens (na)` and `pick, pluck (tsumi)`. His wife passed away in the nuclear disaster at Fukushima, where she worked as a scientist researching a renewable energy reactor.
He's a single parent inventor who used to work for a huge tech company until he got fired once they rendered him obsolete.
Now he is helping out the community by teaching them to do repairs and runs a small electronics shop. He also makes practical and fun inventions like toys and playgrounds out of trashed items. He's loved by a lot of people, and has a strong bond with his daughter.
